message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a fantastic product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm asking for $15000 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I understand its value, but I am only able to pay up to $10000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement within this range?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not able to go that low.  I'm willing to come down to $13000. This still leaves room for us both to be happy with the deal. What do you think?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget constraints, I am proposing to purchase the product for $12000.
